section.title: The All-In-One Approach to Level Payment Annuities
section.p: The best way to think about annuities-immediate and annuities-due is to focus on when the annuity is valued, not when the payments take place. Then we can move around the timeline as needed to solve problems. In this activity, we will work on developing this way of thinking and this intuition.
